constantValues: Contains information about a tracked support KPI for a specific customer.

members.name: SLAItemId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the SLA Item.

members.description: Unique identifier of the SLA Item.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a descriptive name of the service level agreement (SLA) item.

members.description: Type a descriptive name of the service level agreement (SLA) item.

members.name: owningBusinessUnit

constantValues: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

members.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the SLA Item

members.description: Type additional information to describe the SLA Item

members.name: relatedField

constantValues: Select the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) that this SLA Item is created for.

members.description: Select the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) that this SLA Item is created for.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier for SLA associated with SLA Item.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier for SLA associated with SLA Item.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: modifiedBy

constantValues: Shows who last updated the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows who last updated the record.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate between the currency associated with the SLA Item record and the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate between the currency associated with the SLA Item record and the base currency.

members.name: versionNumber

constantValues: Version number of the SLA Item.

members.description: Version number of the SLA Item.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the SLA Item record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the SLA Item record.

members.description: Condition for SLA item

members.name: successConditionsXml
members.description: Condition for SLA item

members.name: solutionId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the associated solution.

members.description: Unique identifier of the associated solution.

members.name: componentState

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.description: For internal use only.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'componentState_display' is added to the 'SLAItem' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'componentState'
addSupportingAttribute.name: componentState_display

members.name: overwriteTime
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: isManaged
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: SLAItemIdUnique
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: sequenceNumber

constantValues: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

members.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

members.name: failureAfter

constantValues: Select how soon the success criteria must be met until the SLA item is considered failed and failure actions are initiated. The actual duration is based on the business hours as specified in the associated SLA record.

members.description: Select how soon the success criteria must be met until the SLA item is considered failed and failure actions are initiated. The actual duration is based on the business hours as specified in the associated SLA record.

members.name: warnAfter

constantValues: Select how soon the success criteria must be met before warning actions are initiated. The actual duration is based on the business hours as specified in the associated SLA record.

members.description: Select how soon the success criteria must be met before warning actions are initiated. The actual duration is based on the business hours as specified in the associated SLA record.

members.name: owningUser

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who owns the SLA Item record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the SLA Item record.

members.name: workflowId

constantValues: Workflow associated with the SLA Item.

members.description: Workflow associated with the SLA Item.

constantValues: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

constantValues: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.
